About Me

This is what I do.

Hi, I'm Tamer Medhat

A passionate back-end developer with a strong foundation in building efficient, scalable, and secure web applications.

As a recent graduate, I bring fresh perspectives and a hunger for learning to every project I tackle.

My expertise lies in crafting robust back-end solutions using PHP, MySQL, and custom ORM techniques, complemented by a solid understanding of front-end integration. Currently, I’m focused on expanding my skill set, contributing to open-source projects,

and bringing creative ideas to life through clean code. Let’s connect and build something amazing together!
